metadata.name: The Shift of Attention
metadata.description:
The Shift of Attention
The constant graphs tracking distracts the artist from his art object. 
The gray colour of the man in the picture symbolizes his  certain dissolving and assimilation with surrounding environment.
This is where our world is moving. Staring into our future 
The History of the Work
As NFT is all about the digital art, so at the beginning the work was first created in Photoshop ,then reproduced by hand in painting on canvas and then again was transferred back into digital form and animated.
MPEG-4 3120 x 2444 px /  13,1 mb 
Originally painted in 2021
Acrylic on  canvas, 70x90 cm
